1.「俺は 魔獣をあやつり 世界に恐怖と混乱を| もたらした……。弁解の余地もない。: I manipulate magical beasts and bring fear and|chaos to the world... I have no excuse.

2.「魔獣との戦いに 身を投じてきた お前には| 話しておかねばなるまいな。: I have to talk to you, you who have thrown|yourself into the battle against demonic|beasts.

The infinite beast Nerosgog, the mourning|beast Zontedor, the possessed beast Zalborg,|the proliferating beast Vairogog...what were|
|the four magical beasts?

4.「かつて 俺は 神墟ナドラグラムで| 竜神の心臓を奪取した。: Once I took the heart of the dragon god in the|divine ruin Nadragam.

5.「王立アルケミアに隠されていた 特殊な| 魔獣の卵を孵化させるため 竜神の心臓に:
This is because the enormous energy in the|heart of the Dragon God was needed to hatch|the eggs of a special magical beast that was|
|hidden in the Royal Alchemia.

6.「そうして生まれた 魔獣たちに 俺は| アストルティアの歴史に その名を刻む|: To the magical beasts born in this way, I gave|the abilities of the fearsome demons whose|names are etched in the history of Astrutia.

8.「その計画も お前の活躍により 完璧なものには| ならなかったが……魔獣の肉体を:
That plan, too, has not been perfected thanks|to your success... but the life form inside|the cocoon is steadily being perfected as it|
|absorbs the body of the magical beast.

9.「そして キュロノスは 繭から羽化した| 生命体に おのが精神を移すことで| 完: Cylonos is trying to obtain a perfect body by|transferring his spirit to the life form that|hatches from the cocoon.

10.「人の世を……世界を終わらせる そのために。: To end the world of mankind...to end the|world.

11.「……キュロノスの支配下にあった 俺は| それを 未来を守るためと 信じ込まされ:
I was under the control of Culonos, who|convinced me that it was to protect the|future, and I was forced to do whatever he|
|wanted.

12.「実際は そのすべてが| 世界に仇なす行為だった……。: In fact, the whole thing was an act of|vengeance against the world...

13.「……時獄の迷宮に行き キュロノスを倒す。| それが 罪を重ねてきた 俺にできる: I will go to the Labyrinth of Time and defeat|Cyronos. That's the least I can do to atone|for the many sins I've committed.

14.「また ひとりで 行くつもりなのね。| ムチャよ！ 回復したばかりなんでしょ？: You're going by yourself again. You're crazy!|You just got better, didn't you?

15.「メレアーデ……お前が無事で 安心した。| しかし この時代に 来ていたとは……: Mereade...I am relieved you are safe. But I|didn't know you had come in this time...

17.「私は……大丈夫よ。いろいろ あったけど……| <pc>に 助けてもらえたから。: I'm... okay. I've been through a lot... and|<pc> helped me through it.

18.「それよりも 叔父様。| 行くなら 私も連れていって。| 何か 手伝えることが: More importantly, uncle. If you're going, take|me with you. I might be able to help you.

19.「<pc>だって そう思うでしょ？| ふたりで 叔父様を助けましょうよ。: <pc>Because you think so, don't|you? Let's both help your uncle.

21.「時空の狭間にある 時獄の迷宮には 一度でも| そこへ到達した者しか 行くことが: Only those who have once reached the labyrinth|of time and space can go there.

23.「そんな……どうにか ならないの？| ３人で行ったほうが きっと うまくいくわ。: Oh no...can't we do something about it, I'm|sure it will work out better if the three of|us go together.

24.「今は 一刻を争うときだ。: Now is the time to make a decision.

25.「ただ……マデ神殿になら 時獄へと至る| 特別な方法が あるかもしれない……。|: But... there may be a special way to get to|the Temple of Madre... It is only a legend.

26.「すっかり 世話をかけたな <pc>。| 無事に やりとげたら あらためて礼に来: Thanks for all your help <pc>.|I'll come back to thank you when I'm done.|Until then, take care of Meleade.

27.「メレアーデも……気持ちだけで 充分だ。| 絶対 マローネを救いだしてみせる。|: And Meleade... the feeling is enough. I will|definitely rescue Marrone. So...don't worry|too much.

28.「心配するなって 言われても| そんなの……ムリだわ。: Even if you tell me not to worry, I can't do|that.

Uncle Padre's Temple of Madea is a forbidden|site northwest of the royal city of Quimbel.|There is a way to get to the Labyrinth of|
|Time...

30.「考えても はじまらないわね。| まずは 王都へ行って マデ神殿に入るには| ど: Let's not even begin to think about it. First,|let's go to the Royal City and find out how to|enter the Temple of Madeh.

31.「どうやら 方針は 決まったキュね。| 王都キィンベルを目指して| エテーネルキ: It looks like we've decided on a course of|action. Launch the Eternel Cube toward the|royal city of Kimbel!

32.「……黒曜の隕石孔には 誰も近づかせるな。| 異変があったら すぐに 知らせろ。:
...Do not let anyone go near the meteorite pit|on Black Sunday. If you see anything out of|the ordinary, let us know immediately. No|
|matter how small it is.

35.「背なんか すっかり 高くなって……| 弟っていうよりも むしろ お兄さんね。: He's so tall...he's more like an older brother|than a younger brother.

36.「姉さんは 変わらないな。| 記憶の中の 姉さんのままで うれしいよ。: You haven't changed, sister. I'm glad you're|still the same sister I remember.

37.「エテーネに帰ってから すぐ| 姉さんの捜索を 始めたんだが| 手がかりすら見つ: I started searching for my sister as soon as I|got back to Etaine, but I couldn't even find a|clue, so I was stuck.

38.「そう…………。心配 かけたみたいね。| あなたは １０年以上も| ウルベア地下: Well... I'm sorry to have worried you. I hear|you've spent over a decade in the Urbea|Underground Empire...

39.「そして……処刑された とも……。| いったい どういうことなの？: And... they were executed. What the hell is|going on?

41.「<kyodai>と 俺のために作った| ふたつの エテーネルキューブ……| こ: <kyodai> and the two ethener cubes you|made for me... this is one of them.

42.「あの時 深手を負い 地面に激突する寸前に| こいつが発動して 俺は この時代に:
Just before I hit the ground with a deep|wound, this thing was activated and I was able|to come back to this time period. It was a|
|miracle...

43.「その エテーネルキューブを作るため| グルヤンラシュと名乗って ガテリアの人た:
Is it true that he called himself Guryan Rash|and did terrible things to the people of|Gateria in order to create that ethener|
|cube...?

44.「この時代に……エテーネ王国に戻るには| ああするほか 道はなかった。: In these times... there was no other way to|return to the Kingdom of Etaine but to do so.

45.「弁解しないのね……。| ひとつの国家を 地上から消し去って……| いったい ど: You make no excuses... how many lives have|been lost by wiping out a nation from the face|of the earth?

46.「クオード……ねえ わかってるの？| あなたがやったことの 意味を。: Quode... hey do you understand? The meaning of|what you did.

48.「……俺を責めて 気がすむのなら いくらでも| 責めればいい。だが どんな犠牲を: You can blame me all you want if it makes you|feel better. But no matter what the cost, I|couldn't let it end in that era.

49.「エテーネ王国を 滅亡から救うまで| 俺は 死ねない！| この命は……エテーネの: I will not die until I save the Kingdom of|Etaine from destruction! This life...I will|use it for Etaine.

50.「……そうか。まだ 知らないんだな。| 我が国に迫る 滅びの危機を……。: ...I see. You still don't know. The impending|doom of our nation...

I learned the history of this period in the|future Urbaean Empire, when the Kingdom of|Etaine was submerged and destroyed without a|

|happening.

53.「だが エテーネ王家に つらなる者として| 俺は この国を アストルティアの歴史: But as a member of the royal family of Etaine,|I will not let this country be erased from the|history of Astrutia!

54.「国を救うために 帰ってきたんじゃ| ないとすると……| 何か ほかに事情が あ: If you didn't come back to save your|country... what else is going on?

55.<pc>は クオードに|封印されている マデ神殿に|入るための手段を探していると: <pc> told Quad that he was looking|for a way to get into the Temple of Madeh,|which is sealed.

The Temple of Madeh... that place must have|been a forbidden place sealed off by the royal|ancestors... If you want to know more, you'll|
|have to search through ancient documents.

57.「……いいだろう。何か理由があるようだし| 神殿に入る方法は 俺が探そう。| 代: ...Fine. You have your reasons, and I'll find|a way to get into the temple. Instead, I want|you to help me stop the submersion.

58.「……姉さん。| 俺のことを 信用してくれないか？| たしかに この手は 血で汚: ...sister. You trust me, don't you? Yes, this|hand is stained with blood.

59.「だが エテーネの救済に つながるなら| 約束を たがえたりはしない……。| そ: But I will not renege on my promise if it|leads to the salvation of Etaine... I swear it|on my life!

60.「どうして ウルベアや ガテリアの人たちにも| 今と同じだけの 思いやりを| か: Why couldn't we extend the same amount of|compassion to the people of Urbaea and Gateria|as we do now...

61.「メレアーデには 抵抗感があるみたいキュね。| けど クオードと手を組むのが も:

63.「やれやれキュ～。このボクと 魔法生物の| ちがいすら 見分けられないなんて！|:

|man's eyes are so blind.

64.「……いいわ。申し出を 受けましょう。| 滅亡のふちに立たされた エテーネを救う: ...Okay. I accept your offer. It is my duty as|well as yours to save Etaine from the brink of|destruction.

65.「ただし やるからには 絶対に成功させるわよ！| この国に生きる すべての人たち: But if we do it, we will make sure it|succeeds! When we have protected the future of|everyone in this country...

|say.

76.「ディ…ディアンジ。いいい いつまで| メレアーデ様を 立たせておくつもりだ。|: Di...dianzi. I'm going to keep Meleade|standing until the end of time. I'm going to|ask him to sit down as soon as possible.

77.「おーっと そうでした！？| ささっ。どうぞ おかけになってください。| 今 お: Oops, that's right! Whisper it. Please have a|seat. I'll bring you some tea.

Yes! He may have changed his appearance, but|he is still the same person he used to be. He|is a kind and straightforward person with a|
|good heart.

You have grown to love your country and care|for your people even more than before! It is a|sign that you are becoming more aware of your|
|position as king.

83.「……でででも どこか 遠くに感じる。| 心に何かを ひ…秘めてるような……。: ...but it feels somewhere far away. It's like|you're holding something inside of you...

86.「ディアンジ……| 私たち あなたを手伝うために 来たのよ。: Dianzi...we are here to help you.

87.「地脈エネルギーの枯渇で エテーネが水没する。| この危機を どうにかするための:

89.「できれば 自力で 完成させたかったのですが| この上は どなたか 優秀な錬金術:

|this one...

92.「そういうことなら 私と <pc>で| 地脈の結晶を 錬金できそうな人を探すわ。:
If that's the case, me and |will find someone who could smelt the earth|vein crystals. can be counted|
|on, so don't worry!

93.「おお 手伝ってくださいますか！| ご協力 感謝 感謝ですよぉ。| これで 他に: Oh, you want to help us? Thank you so much for|your help. Now I can concentrate on preparing|other things I need!

94.「では <pc>さんには| こちらを お渡ししておきますね。: Now I will give you this one for|<pc>.

98.「……ワグミカさん。考えなおしてください。| あなたの錬金術のウデに 大勢の命と: ...Mr. Wagmika. Please reconsider. Many lives|and the future of the kingdom depend on your|alchemical skills.

99.「フン。どこかで見た カオだと思えば| ドミネウスの 娘っ子か！: Hm. If you think you've seen Kao anywhere,|she's the daughter of Dominus!

100.「国を ほったらかしにして 行方を| くらませていた 王族の小娘ふぜいが| どの:

|people? Damn!

101.「同志 ワグミカ。本日の 農作業のノルマを| 達成いたしました……おっと| 来客: Comrade Wagmika. I have completed my quota for|today's farming work... Oops, I didn't know|you were in the middle of a visitor, my bad!

102.「ふるえを治す お薬があるんですよね？| どうか お薬を飲んで 地脈の結晶の錬金:

|do so.

103.「ぬしの親父のせいで ワシのキャリアは台無し！| なのに 必要になったから 手伝: Your father ruined my career! And now you want|me to help you because you're needed? You've|got a right to make fun of me!

104.「ぬしを見てると ドミネウスのクソを| 思いだして 気分が悪くなるわ！| 薬なん: You make me sick, you remind me of Dominus|shit! I don't give a shit who takes my pills!|Now go home!

105.「も…もうしわけないんだモーン。| ご主人も 飲みたくないと 言ってるので| 今: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, I'm sorry. Your husband|doesn't want to drink either, so I'd like you|to go home for today.

106.「ワグミカさんには お薬が必要よ。| モモンタルちゃんだって ずっと このままで: Wagmica, you need medication. I'm sure you|don't want her to stay like this forever, do|you?

107.「ワグミカ殿！| 聞こえてますか？ ワグミカ殿！: Mister Wagmica! Can you hear me? Mister|Wagmica!

108.「なんてことだ……王立アルケミアに通じる| 秘密の通路の ありかを 聞きにきたと:
My God... we came here to ask for the location|of the secret passageway to the Royal|Alchemia, and here we are in this|
|gudenguden...

109.「水ぅううう……。| キンキンに冷えた 水ぅううう……。: Water... water so cold... water so cold...|water so cold... water so cold...

110.「しょうのない ご主人なんだモン。| 今 お持ちするんだモーン。: He's a very bad husband. I'm bringing it to|you now, Morn.

111.「あいや。待たれよ モモンタル殿。| クチでは ああ言ってますが ワグミカ殿が|: Oh no. Wait a minute, Lord Momontal. You may|say so, but what you are really looking for is|different.

112.「これを お使いください。| 身体じゅうの毒素を抜く 丸薬です。: Please use this. It is a pill that removes|toxins from the body.

113.「ちと……いや 超がつくほど 苦いのですが| 健全な身体になれば ワグミカ殿も|: It is a bit... well, extremely bitter, but if|he becomes healthy, he will be able to get out|of his self-indulgent life.

115.「真に 主が求めるものを見抜き| 主のために 行動できる者こそが 真の従者。|: Those who can truly see what the Lord wants|and act for Him are the true followers. I hope|we can be like that for each other.

116.「フンッ！ 民草のためならば 協力もしよう。| じゃが 相手が王族なら 話は別よ: Hmph! I will cooperate with you for the sake|of the people. But if they're royalty, that's|a different story! I won't lift a finger!

117.「あっかん べろべろべぇ～！| ドミネウスの娘よッ！ ぬしも 人生がクソだと|: Akkanberoberobee~! Daughter of the Dominus!|You're about to learn that life sucks! Whee-|hee-hee-hee!

118.「ゴシュジーン！！ 見苦しいモーンッ！| 今すぐ ファラス君のくれた あの薬を飲: Gosh darn it!!!! You're not looking good,|Morn! Now take that potion Mr. Faras gave you|and come to your senses, Morn!

119.「だまらっしゃ～い！| ワシに作られた 魔法生物がッ！| 主人である ワシに 指: Shut up! You magical creatures created by me!|You dare to tell me what to do?

120.「クソぅ……何もかも ドミネウスのせいじゃ。| ワシから 仕事を！ 地位を！ 生: Damn...it's all Dominus' fault. I want my job!|A position! My reason for living! It's all|Dominus' fault!

121.「いいかげんに するんだモンッ！| ドミネウスが クソだからって ご主人が| 腐: Enough of this shit! Just because Dominus|sucks is no reason for your master to be|corrupt!

122.「ご主人を頼ってきた <pc>君や| メレアーデ君に チカラを貸してあげるモン！: I'll lend my help to <pc> and Mr.|Meleade, who have come to depend on your|husband! Don't let them think that life sucks.

123.「そんな ムダなことをして ワシに| なんの得があると いうんじゃい！: What good would it do me to waste my time like|that!

124.「損得の話じゃないモン！ 人生はクソだと| うつむいて 腐ってしまった人の救いと:
It's not about profit and loss Mon! I want my|husband back...to be the salvation of those|who have become depressed and rotten that life|
|sucks...I want him back.

125.「ボクは また 従者として| ご主人を ほこりに思いたいんだモン！: I want to dust my master as a squire again!

127.「……フンッ！| たまには お前のカオを立ててやるか……。| 飲んでやるのじゃ！: ...humph! I'll stand up for you Khao for a|change... and you will drink! Take this|fucking bitter medicine!

131.「見苦しいところを お見せしました。| こちらが ご所望の地脈の結晶です。: I'm sorry to show you the unsightly part. Here|are the crystals of the earth veins you|requested.

|improperly.

|this one.

|more likely to bite this way than that bait|station...

143.「さあ 食いしん坊さん！| こっちに もっと も～っと| おいしいエサが ありま: Come on, foodies! We've got the tastiest bait|over here!

149.「ひっ ひぇええええええっ！| どどど どおしましょうぉおおお！！| そそ 想定: Hi-hii-hii-hii-hii-hii-hii-hii-hii-hi! Oh, no,|no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no! This is an|unexpected situation!

154.「はぁはぁ……でも メレアーデ様まで| 戦うなんて……もし クオード様が知れば…: Hahahaha...but even Meleade-sama is|fighting...if Quaude-sama finds out...she|might get angry out of worry....

The ground in the Greater Etene Islands has|been unstable due to the continued depletion|of geothermal energy. This earthquake is|
|probably the cause.

157.「こうしては いられません！| 地脈の結晶に集めた エネルギーを| 至急 大地に: We can't keep doing this! The energy collected|in the crystals of the earth's veins will be|returned to the earth as soon as possible!

158.「今 未来が変わったキュ！| どうやら この島が水没する未来を| 回避できたみた: Now the future has changed! It looks like|we've averted a future where this island will|be flooded!

159.「ディアンジー！ 王都へ戻りましょう！| クオードが 吉報を待ってるわー。: Dianzie! Let's go back to King's Landing!|Quode is waiting for good news!

161.「そのカオ……どうやら 水没の元凶を| 倒してくれたようだな。| ザグルフの直感: That Cao...it looks like you've defeated the|source of the submergence. So Zaghruv's|intuition was right.

163.「いいい以前は 感じられた 元凶の気配が| き…消えたので 黒曜の隕石孔まで行っ: I went to the meteorite pit on Black Friday to|investigate the source of the problem, which I|could feel before.

164.「……というわけだ。お前たちの| 晴れやかなカオと合わせて 考えれば| 計画の成: So...there you have it. Combined with your|sunny chao, I'm convinced that our plan is a|success.

And Dianzi. You have done a great job in|arranging all the necessary ingredients for|the project. I thank you from the bottom of my|
|heart.

I didn't do much. In the first place, I|couldn't smelt the crystal of the earth vein|by myself and had to rely on|
|...

173.「自分の至らないところを 素直に認め| 人を頼ってでも 成果をあげようとした。|:
He honestly admitted his shortcomings and|tried to achieve results even if he had to|rely on others. I appreciate his flexible|
|judgment.

174.「うおーん うおーん。クオード様ぁ～！！ | そんな言葉を かけてもらえるなんて: Oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo|oooooooooooooo. Oh, Mr. Quad! I am so thrilled|to hear you say that~!

175.「それから……<pc>に 姉さん。| こんな俺の言葉を 信じてくれて ありがとう: And then...sis to <pc>. Thanks for|taking my word for this.

176.「<pc>には 礼を 用意している。| ささやかだが 受け取ってくれ。: I have prepared a thank you for|<pc>. Please accept this small|token of appreciation.

178.「ここは 祝いの宴でも もうけたいところだが| お前には大事な用が あるんだった: I would love to have a party to celebrate, but|you have something important to do, don't you?

179.「ディアンジ ザグルフ……さがってくれ。| あとで また 連絡する。: Dianzhizagulf...back off. I'll get back to you|later.

181.「このカギを 覚えているか <pc>。| いにしえの時代に封じられた マデ神殿の:

|released with this key of Tokimi.

182.「こいつは 王家の秘奥に通ずるための| 王たる者の証。マデ神殿も また……| 秘: This is the sign of a king who has access to|the secrets of the royal family. The Temple of|Made is also one of the secrets.

183.「今回は 俺も同行する。これが 王としての| 最後の仕事に なるだろうからな……: This time I will accompany you. This will be|my last job as king...

184.「ティプローネ高地の 北西にある| マデ神殿の扉を 開きにいくぞ。: We're going to open the door to the Temple of|Madeh, northwest of the Tiprone Highlands.

186.「幾度となく あなたを 導いてきたけれど| いつもいつも 思わせぶりなことしか|: I'm sorry I've led you on so many times, but|I've always been so thoughtful...

187.「決定的なことを 伝えてしまうと| 正しい未来への道筋が 閉ざされてしまうかも|: If we tell them something definitive, it might|close off the path to the right future...

191.「これから 私は……| 最後の役目を まっとうするわ。: From now on I will... fulfill my last role.

192.「この島に生きる すべての民を守り| エテーネの未来を 切りひらいてみせる。: I will protect all the people living on this|island and open up the future of Etaine.

193.「……命に代えても 成功させてみせるわ。| それが 王家に生まれた者の つとめだ: I will succeed even if it costs me my life.|That is the duty of a person born into a royal|family.

194.「ふたりとも さようなら。| 願わくば 私たちの選ぶ道が| 正しき未来へと つな: Goodbye to both of you. Hopefully the path we|choose will lead us to a just future.

195.「キュロノスを倒して| 滅びの未来を 回避できたなら……| ボクたちは きっと: If we can defeat Kyronos and avert a future of|destruction... we will be reunited!

196.「<pc>を 信じるキュ！| ボクたちは 必ず キュロノスを倒すキュ！: I believe in <pc>! We will defeat|Kyronos!

197.「キュロノスを倒したら 迎えにきて。| ずっとずっと……待っているから。: When you defeat Culonos, come and get me. I'll|be waiting for you for a long, long time.

199.「メレアーデにならって ボクたちも| なすべきことを まっとうするキュ！| 永久: We will do what we have to do, just like|Meleade! We will go to the royal capital to|move the perpetual time ring!

203.「やれやれ……。| 建国の祖の一角たる 偉人を相手に| 無礼きわまりない奴だキュ: Good grief.......he is so rude to a great man|who is one of the founders of our country.

204.「私の名は 漂流者キュレクス。| エテーネ王国 建国の祖たる| 初代国王レトリウ: My name is Culex the Castaway. I am a great|friend of Retorius, the first king and founder|of the Kingdom of Ethene.

205.「キュレクス…………だと？| つくなら もう少し ましなウソをつけ。| ７００年: Culex...? If you're going to tell a lie, you|might as well tell a better one...he's a|historical figure from over 700 years ago.

206.「……そもそも キュレクスは人間のはずよ。: ...Culex is supposed to be human to begin|with.

Therefore, he has a much longer life span than|humans. On the other hand, the descendants of|Retorius are steadily increasing in|
|generations, and you are the 50th generation.

211.「それにしても おもしろい姉弟だキュレ～。| 時渡りで 別々の時代へ流され それ: But still, they are interesting siblings. They|were swept across time to different eras, and|spent different times in different places.

212.「なるほど。姉と弟で 生体継続時間が| 逆転してるのも 納得キュレ。: I see. I see why the biological duration is|reversed between the sister and the brother.

214.「そう言ってるキュレ。いい機会だから| 祖先に 都合のいい歴史を吹き込まれた|:
That's what I'm saying, Kyure. This is a good|opportunity for me to teach the true history|to those of you who have been fed a convenient|
|history by your ancestors.

215.「そもそも お前たちが宿す 時渡りのチカラは| 私が 朋友レトリウスに 分けあた:

|from generation to generation.

216.「しかし 私は……人間を 見誤ったキュレ。| レトリウスが いかに 高潔な人物で:
But I... have misjudged mankind, Cure. However|virtuous Letrius may have been, it does not|follow that even his descendants will be the|
|same...

217.「人間とは 世代をかさねる 生き物だと| 当時の私は 理解していなかったキュレ～: I did not understand at the time that human|beings are creatures that repeat generations.

218.「エテーネを築いた レトリウスは とっとと| 死んでいったキュレ……。残された:
Retorius, who built Ethene, died quickly,|cure... The remaining children and|grandchildren turned to me, cure, to see the|
|future of the kingdom.

219.「そうして エテーネ王国は 私の時見を活用し| 自然災害や 飢饉による危機を回避: The kingdom of Ethene, using my knowledge of|time and avoiding crises caused by natural|disasters and famine, began to flourish.

220.「しかし 最初こそ 神のごとく敬っていた私を| 祭司たち……レトリウスの子孫は: But the priests, who at first respected me|like a god...the descendants of Letrius...did|as they pleased...and they were bad cure.

221.「当時の祭司長は 錬金術で作った道具をもちいて| 私から 時見の源泉を奪った挙句:

|in the Temple of Made.

222.「その後 彼らは 私のチカラの源から| 物言わぬ 時見の能力だけを持った存在を|:
They then created a being from the source of|my power that had only the ability to see and|hear nothing, and packed him in the box you|
|see.

223.「……それが 時見の箱なのか！？: ...That's what the Tokimi box is for!

224.「ご名答。そして 時見の箱と交信できるのは| 時渡りのチカラを 受け継ぐ| 建国:
Good answer. And only those of the lineage of|Letorius, the founding king who inherited the|power of time-walking, can communicate with|
|the box of Tokimi...

225.「私たちの祖先が そんな ひどいことを| おこなっていたなんて……。: I can't believe our ancestors did such|terrible things...

226.「返せるものなら その 時見の源泉を| お返ししたいのですが……王宮が消えた|: If I could return it, I would give you back|the source of that Tokimi, but now that the|royal palace is gone, it may be lost...

227.「いいや まだ 存在しているキュレ。| この島の どこかから かつて私の一部だっ:
No, the cure still exists. From somewhere on|this island I feel the vibrations of the|source of Tokimi that was once a part of me,|
|Cure.

228.「奪われた 時見の源泉は お前たちの| 言葉でいうと 球根みたいな形をしてるキュ: The source of the stolen Tokimi is shaped like|a bulb in your language, Kyure. Do you have|any idea what it is?

230.「前に <pc>と 王家の温室に行ったとき| 目にした 巨大な球根！| あれが:
I saw those giant bulbs when I was in the|royal greenhouse with before!|Could that be the source of Mr. Culex's time-|
|watching?

231.「もし 時見の源泉を 返してくれたなら| お前たちが 行きたがっている| 時獄の: If you return the source of Tokimi, I will|allow you to go to the labyrinth of Toki|Jigoku, where you want to go.

232.「きっと まちがいないわ！| 軍区画の転送の門から| 王家の温室に 行ってみまし: You betcha! Go to the royal greenhouse through|the transfer gate in the military section.

233.「おお……なつかしい この波動。| まごうことなき 時見の源泉キュレね。: Oh...this is the nostalgic vibe. It's the|fountainhead of Tokimi.

234.「奪われていたものを 返されて| 礼を言うのも おかしな話キュレ。: It's funny cure to thank them for returning|something that had been taken from them.

235.「けれど 時見の源泉を奪ったのは| 遠い祖先のしわざで お前たちではないキュレ。: But it was the work of our distant ancestors|that deprived us of the source of Tokimi, not|you. Here, I say thank you honestly.

236.「では さっそく いただくキュレ。: Now, let's get started with the curries.

237.「みみみ みなぎってきたキュレェー！！: Curee that's coming through my ears!!!!

238.「ブフィ～。ひさかたぶりに 真の姿を| 取り戻したキュレ！| かつてない 高ぶり: Bufi~! For the first time in a long time, I|have regained my true form, Kyure~! I feel an|unprecedented high, Kyure~!

240.「キュレェ～ッ！ 見える！ 時が見える！！: Curee~! I see it! I see time!

241.「エテーネ王国は……間もなく……滅びる……。: The Kingdom of Etaine... will soon...|perish...

243.「どういうことですか？| 水没による滅亡なら 回避したはずです！: What do you mean? If it were destruction by|submersion, we would have averted it!

244.「お前たちは ７００年の 長きにわたり| 時見を くり返してきた……。: You have been watching time and time again for|700 years...

245.「大津波 大飢饉 水没……| さまざまな災厄を 避けてきたが| それは 運命を歪: Tsunamis, famine, submergence... we have|avoided various calamities, but that only|distorts our destiny.

250.「ふざけるなッ！ 俺たちのやったことが| 無意味だったとでも 言うのかッ！？: Stop kidding around! Are you saying that what|we did was meaningless!

251.「この ペテン師めッ！| どうせ 妖しげな術で 幻覚を見せただけだ！| お前の時: You crook! You're just a man who conjures up|illusions with your bewitching arts! Who would|believe your illusions!

253.「……やれやれ。せっかちな奴だキュレ。| でも お前たちは 動じていないキュレね: Oh dear. He's an impatient guy, Kyure. But you|guys are unfazed, aren't you?

254.「あなたが 真の時見の使い手なら| 隕石による滅びをも 回避する未来を| 見せら: If you are a true user of time vision, you can|show us a future in which we can avoid|destruction by a meteorite... right?

255.「たとえ 回避したそばから 次の滅びが| おそってきたとしても……私たちは 黙っ: Even if the next destruction comes just as we|have averted it we cannot just sit back and|accept it!

256.「ブッフォオオオオーッ！！| キモのすわった 奴だキュレ。お前からは| 確かに: Bufo ooooh!!!! You're a creepy guy, Cure. I|can certainly feel the blood of Letrius in|you, Kyure.

257.「そんな お前には 隕石落下を阻止する| とっておきの秘策を さずけてやるキュレ: I'm going to give you a secret plan to stop|the meteorite from falling.

259.「王都キィンベルの 中央広場には| 永久時環と名付けられた 砂時計のような| 建:
Do you know that in the central square of the|royal city of Kimbel there is an hourglass-|like structure named the Perpetual Hour Ring,|
|Cure?

260.「永久時環は ただの芸術作品ではないキュレ。| 空中に散らばる 微量な時渡りのチ:
The perpetual time ring is not just a work of|art. It is a device with the function of|extracting and storing a minute amount of|
|time-traveling power scattered in the air.

261.「かつて レトリウスと 腹心のユマテルという| 錬金術師が 子孫が起こすであろう: It was built by an alchemist named Umater who|foresaw the mistakes his descendants would|make.

262.「……あいつらは たいした知恵者だったキュレ。| 永久時環を用いれば 隕石という: They were very wise men. With the use of a|perpetual time ring, even the calamity of a|meteorite would be out of the question.

263.「ただし 永久時環を 起動させるには| レトリウスの血をひく者……: However, in order to activate the perpetual|time ring, one must be of Letrius' blood...

265.「まず 祭具棟へ行って 花のリストレットを探し| それを身につけて 戻ってくるキ:
First, the cure goes to the ritual equipment|building to find a flower wristlet and returns|wearing it. The rest of the story is then|
|told.

266.「おお！ 戻ってきたキュレね。| 花のリストレットは 見つけたキュレ？: Oh! You're back, Cure. Did you find the flower|wristlet, Cure?

267.「さっそく 永久時環の起動法を| 伝授するキュレ。もっと そばに来るキュレ。: Cure quickly teaches how to activate the|perpetual time ring. Cure comes closer to me.

268.「脳に直接 大量の情報を送るから| ちょ～っと 具合が 悪くなるかもしれないけど: It sends a lot of information directly to your|brain, so you might get a little sick, but|you'll just have to hold on and endure!

270.「……私が チカラを取り戻したのを| キュロノスに 感知されたようキュレ。: CURRENOS seems to have sensed that I have|regained my strength.

271.「私は 正しき時の流れの 守護者。: I am the guardian of the righteous flow of|time.

272.「来たるべき未来を さまたげんとする者よ。| キュロノスの裁きを 受けよ！: O ye who would hinder the future to come! Be|judged by Cyronos!

273.<center>貴様が キュレクス……。|我が祖にして 同等の能力をもつ個体。: You are Culex, my ancestor and equal in|ability.

274.<center>なんと ちっぽけな。|失望を 禁じ得ない……。: How tiny. Can't help but be disappointed...

275.<center>なれど 貴様の存在を許したとあれば|雑音なき世界を到来させる さ: But if we allow you to exist, you will be an|obstacle to bringing about a world without|noise.

276.「あわれな……。時見を通じ 幾度となく| 人間たちの闇を 直視し続けた果てに|:
You are a cure who has been facing the|darkness of the human race through time and|time again, and you yourself have become|
|distorted.

277.「さわがしいキュ！ 安眠妨害っキュよ！: It's making too much noise! You're disturbing|my sleep!

278.「キュキュキュキュ！？| 何が どうなってるキュ！？: Cu-cu-cu-cu! What the hell is going on?

282.<center>なれど 時見すらできぬ 未熟な個体など|手を下すに 値せず。: But an inexperienced individual who cannot|even see the time is not worthy of our|intervention.

283.<center>我こそは 唯一無二の 時の支配者。|ならぶ者なき 究極の存在。: I am the one and only ruler of time. I am the|ultimate existence without equal.

285.「もう 間にあわないキュレ……| それより 小さき者よ……私のそばに……。: I am no longer in time for you, Cure... but|you, little one... stay close to me...

286.「ボクのことは キュルルと呼ぶキュ。| ……お前を見てると モヤモヤするんだけど: I'm called Curle. ...I'm a bit confused when I|look at you, but who the hell are you?

287.「その様子だと……私のことはおろか| 自分が何者かも 理解していないキュレね。|: By the looks of you... you don't even know who|you are, let alone who I am. Quickly take my|hand...take my hand...

288.「なるほど……お前もまた| 私のチカラの源から 分化した存在……。: I see... you are also a being differentiated|from the source of my power...

289.「それって 親子みたいなものキュ？: Is that a cu like parent and child?

290.「親子という概念には 当てはまらないキュレ。| 私たちは 同一にして 異質なる存:
Cure does not fit the concept of parent and|child. We are one and the same, yet|different... an otherworldly life form that|
|wanders between time and space...

291.「もう 時間がないキュレ……。| キュルル……お前に 私の……| 知識と能力のす: We are running out of time Curle... Curle... I|give you all of my... knowledge and abilities|Curle.

293.「……おかしいキュ。| む…胸が……胸が 苦しいキュ！| シクシクと 痛みが 消: ...It's not right. My chest...my chest is|painful! The pain doesn't go away.

294.「……彼の死を 悲しいと感じてるからよ。| あなたにとって キュレクスさんが|: ...because you feel sad about his death. It's|a sign that Mr. Culex was special to you...

295.「たった今 出会ったばかりの相手に| 調子を狂わされるなんて 理解不能キュ。|: It's incomprehensible to me that someone I|just met could make me lose my temper. I'm|going to change my mind immediately.

296.「アイツから 受け取った知識に 永久時環の| 起動のしかたがあったキュ！ 隕石落:
The knowledge I received from him was how to|activate the perpetual time loop! If you want|to avoid a future of falling meteorites, you'd|
|better hurry.

297.「……わかったわ。王都の広場にある| 永久時環を 動かしにいきましょう。: ...Okay. Let's go move the perpetual time ring|in the Royal Plaza.

298.「メレアーデよ お前が 資格者の証を| 身につける必要があるキュレ。お前からは|: Meleade, you need to wear the credentials,|Cure. I feel the blood of Letrius most|strongly in you, Cure.

299.「水没する未来を 回避したことによって| より 大きな災厄が おそってくるキュレ: The cure is averting a submerged future, and a|greater calamity is coming.
